org.apache.spark.network.protocol

Class AbstractMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.spark.network.protocol.AbstractMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Encodable, Message
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractResponseMessage, ChunkFetchFailure, ChunkFetchRequest, OneWayMessage, RpcFailure, RpcRequest, StreamFailure, StreamRequest

    public abstract class AbstractMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Message
    Abstract class for messages which optionally contain a body kept in a separate buffer.
